start_help_text:
Hello! I am your bot. I can do:

/start - Start
/help - Get help
/System - System of linear equations
/Quad - Quadratic equation
/StringVibration - Mathematical-physical equation of string vibration
/RodHeating - Mathematical-physical equation of heating the rod
/CVMaker - automatical CV maker
/Change_Language_EN - English
/Change_Language_DE - Deutsch
/Change_Language_UA - Українська
/Change_Language_RU - Русский
